definitions.definition: A higher than normal body temperature of a person (or, generally, a mammal ), usually caused by disease.
examples: There has been a rise in my fever . I think I've the flu.

labels: usually in combination with one or more preceding words
definitions.label_groups: usually in combination with one or more preceding words

definitions.definition: A state of excitement or anxiety .
Sexual attraction towards a specific group of people.

main_definition: ( medicine ) A higher than normal body temperature of a person (or, generally, a mammal ), usually caused by disease.
secondary_definitions: ( usually in combination with one or more preceding words ) Any of various diseases.
A state of excitement or anxiety .
( in combination , slang , often derogatory ) Sexual attraction towards a specific group of people.
